title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: local runner for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list, delete models with native streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, prompts library.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer, streaming, and LiveBook notebooks.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with async options and streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for local Q&A.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama REST API with Tokio, streaming, and model management.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing Ollama integration with admin UI and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-react
summary: React hooks and components for chatting with Ollama via the official JS SDK.
